menu.menudata: select years.id,case when years.id>0 then years.id else 'Unknown' end from years order by years.id desc

option.name: Sort by artist
option.menudata: select albums.id,concat(albums.title, ' (', contributors.name ,')') from albums,contributor_track,contributors,tracks where tracks.id=contributor_track.track and contributor_track.contributor=contributors.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) and albums.id=tracks.album and tracks.year={year} group by albums.id order by contributors.namesort asc

menu.menudata: select albums.id,albums.title,substr(albums.titlesort,1,1) from albums,tracks where albums.id=tracks.album and tracks.year={year} group by albums.id order by albums.titlesort
select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.album={album} and tracks.year={year} order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc
